alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 21 at 1:21PM PDT until March 21 at 6:00PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...San Diego County Mountains. * WHEN...Through 6 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Strong winds could damage trees and other objects. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty winds will continue through Wednesday. Snow levels will lower tonight, with up to a foot forecast for the San Diego County mountains. A Winter Weather product will replace this warning to account for hazards due to gusty winds and snow.
info.instruction: Use caution if you must drive.
